Module com.tylerlieu.c195

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
com.tylerlieu.c195.controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller for managing the login.fxml view.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is called as soon as the view begins to load. First, it sets the localization label to show the user's ZoneId. Then, it figures out if the user's language is set to French and changes the text accordingly.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -

    • onButtonLoginClick

      public void onButtonLoginClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called whenever the user clicks on the login button. First, it retrieves the user's input. Then, if any of them are blank, it alerts the user and returns to the end of the method. If not, the method attempts to log the user in. If successful, the scene changes to allow the user to view the application. Otherwise, an alert will show and the user must try again.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Used to get the current stage

    • onButtonExitClick

      public void onButtonExitClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method calls whenever the user clicks on the exit button. This closes the application window, which stops the application.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Used to get the current stage
